snippet: The Swiss national, Lorenzo Vinciguerra, had been held for more than two years by Abu Sayyaf militants in the southern Philippines.
abstract: Lorenzo Vinciguerra, Swiss bird-watcher being held by Abu Sayyaf rebel group for more than two years, escapes during Philippine army raid; Abu Sayyaf rebels have been conducting bombings, kidnappings and other attacks in Philippines for more than a decade, trying to establish strict Islamic state.
lead_paragraph: The Swiss national, Lorenzo Vinciguerra, had been held for more than two years by Abu Sayyaf militants in the southern Philippines.

headline.main: Swiss Hostage Escapes Rebels During Philippine Army Raid
headline.print_headline: Swiss Hostage Escapes Rebels During Philippine Army Raid
